imctools.scripts package¶

Submodules¶

imctools.scripts.convertfolder2imcfolder module¶

imctools.scripts.convertfolder2imcfolder.convert_folder2imcfolder(fol, out_folder, dozip=True)¶

Convert a folder containing IMC acquisitions (mcd and tiff) to a zipfolder containing standardized names files.

imctools.scripts.exportacquisitioncsv module¶

imctools.scripts.exportacquisitioncsv.AC_META = 'acquisition_metadata'¶

Reads all the acquisition metadata from the ome folders and concatenates them to a csv that contains all the metadata.
